service: gcp-api-project

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}  # JWT secret from environment variable
    MONGODB_URI: ${env:MONGODB_URI}  # MongoDB URI from environment variable

functions:
  api:
    handler: index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: api/welcome
          method: get
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/description
          method: get
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/registration
          method: post
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/login
          method: post
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin  # Plugin to load environment variables from .env file
